comment: He was great and very patient when explaining concept. Material is hard so you do have to study but teacher really tries to help every student understand. Very chill and asks for feedback.

He is a great professor and person, and he relates things to the real world pretty well. However, he can be quite picky at grading your tests sometimes and lenient with others. Didn't work out in my favor most of the time.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: Not bad but not good either. He teaches well, the class is SO BORING. Its drives me insane. Class is hard but you cant blame him for that. Overall I personally wouldnt take him again, but if he was the only option I wouldnt avoid him

Qian Zhao AKA Tim is a great professor! strength is not an easy class so you gotta put in the work but he explains everything well and really tries to make sure students understand ! He'll go over stuff from statics too if students need it ! Top drawer guy!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Lecture heavy

comment: Dr. Zhao (we always call him Tim) is a really good professor. I took his class, and it was really easy. He answers all your questions in class. He also prepares you for the final exam that is made by the department. I am currently taking him for Strength of Materials (ENGR 3131). I would really recommend taking his class.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES

comment: Homework is very helpful and relevant to exams. Professor Zhao was very insightful when it comes to students being prepared and successful on assignments.
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--Clear grading criteria

comment: This professor is amazing. He cares a lot about your success and understanding of the material. He goes above and beyond to help. If you do the homework and are able to grasp it then the tests are a breeze. He's super sweet!
